subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Diamondbacks are a largely faceless team, but closer José Valverde, at 6 feet 4 inches and 254 pounds with a scraggly goatee, is perhaps the most recognizable of the bunch.
snippet: The Diamondbacks are a largely faceless team, but closer José Valverde, at 6 feet 4 inches and 254 pounds with a scraggly goatee, is perhaps the most recognizable of the bunch.
